quote: She blew out a breath between gritted teeth. “Sometimes I really want to”—a frustrated sound—“bite you!” He froze. “I might let you.” “I won’t do it if you’d enjoy it.
quote_letters: SHE BLEW OUT A BREATH BETWEEN GRITTED TEETH SOMETIMES I REALLY WANT TO-A FRUSTRATED SOUND-BITE YOU HE FROZE I MIGHT LET YOU I WONT DO IT IF YOUD ENJOY IT
